Joan Castleman.Action: Gently interrupts Joe trying to eat sugar late at night, showing care and concern for his health.
Remains lying awake alongside Joe, trying to get him to sleep, demonstrating patience and companionship.

Offers to give Joe a sleeping pill to help him rest.
Allows Joe to seek comfort by placing her hand on his head to stroke his hair.

Allows Joe to continue despite her disdain and disengages emotionally, settling back to sleep calmly after Joe’s quick climax.
